summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Executive Department - Energy Office authorizing the Director of the Energy Office to execute a contract with the University of Chicago, operator of Argonne National Laboratory; accepting and depositing contract funds in the General Fund; increasing expenditure allowances in the 1981 Budget of the Energy Office by appropriation from the General Fund and reimbursement from the Light Fund and increasing certain expenditure allowances in the 1981 Budget of City Light by appropriation from the Light Fund.
